paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: Familial amyloid polyneuropathy (FAP) with liver dysfunction

individual_records.phenotype_details: Diagnosed with FAP, symptoms include abdominal distension and decreased sensation in lower limbs.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The Val30Met mutation in TTR was confirmed using TTR gene sequencing.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and genetic confirmation.
variants.additional_notes: The patient exhibited symptoms consistent with FAP, which is known to be associated with the Val30Met mutation.
key_quotes: The Val30Met mutation in TTR was confirmed using TTR gene sequencing.
FAP was diagnosed in February 2013 at Peking Union Medical College Hospital using Congo red staining of the intestinal mucosa.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the relevant variant was clearly mentioned in the text.
